Pre-Game Insights: The Mets once again find themselves involved in the only decisive Game 3 of the Wild Card round as they try to punch their ticket to an NLDS matchup with their division rivals in Philadelphia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the NL Wild Card Game 3 between the New York Mets and the Milwaukee Brewers.
The Mets are trying to punch their ticket to an NLDS matchup with their division rivals in Philadelphia.
